name: competence-matcher
description: Matching microservice that allows to allows to define and match on data criteria

scripts.production: if [ -f ./server.pid ]; then PID=$(cat ./server.pid); if ps -p $PID > /dev/null 2>&1 && ps -p $PID -o args= | grep -q node; then echo "Server already running (pid $PID)"; exit 1; fi; fi; node dist/server.js
scripts.production:detached: if [ -f ./server.pid ]; then PID=$(cat ./server.pid); if ps -p $PID > /dev/null 2>&1 && ps -p $PID -o args= | grep -q node; then echo "Server already running (pid $PID)"; exit 1; fi; fi; nohup node dist/server.js >/dev/null 2>&1 & echo $! > ./server.pid
scripts.production:stop: if [ -f ./server.pid ]; then PID=$(cat ./server.pid); if ps -p $PID > /dev/null 2>&1; then kill $PID >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; sleep 1; fi; rm -f ./server.pid; else echo "No server.pid file found"; fi
